name: docker-network
description: Manage Docker networks for container communication

examples.description: Display detailed information about a network

actions: remove - Remove one or more networks
inspect - Display detailed information on one or more networks
connect - Connect a container to a network
disconnect - Disconnect a container from a network

options.description: Driver to manage the network (bridge, overlay, etc.)
IPv4 or IPv6 gateway for the master subnet

network_types: bridge - Default network driver for standalone containers
overlay - Multi-host networking for Docker Swarm
macvlan - Assign MAC address to containers
